General.Name: Shenzhen HeKeda Precision Cleaning Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of precision cleaning equipment in China. The company's product portfolio include precision cleaning equipment for ultrasonic cleaning, plate cleaning, spray cleaning, hydrocarbon cleaning, etc.; pure water production equipment; sewage treatment and reclaimed water reuse equipment; and electronic, plastic, and hardware electroplating equipment. Its products are used in consumer electronics, flat panel displays, auto parts, photovoltaics, equipment manufacturing, home appliances, aerospace, optics, semiconductors, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen HEKEDA Liquid Crystal Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. in December 2012. Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Pei Peng  Wang
1.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
